name: vietnam-coffee-data-portal
description: Vietnam Coffee Export Data Analytics Portal - Professional dashboard with real-time data visualization

scripts.postinstall: python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt

scripts.api:debug: cd web/backend && set FLASK_DEBUG=1 && python api.py
